hypothesis_content.title: Coinbase Stock Catalyst Spillover Asymmetry
hypothesis_content.statement: Positive catalysts for Coinbase stock (COIN) during Dec 22-26 week (stock-trading rollout, analyst upgrades) will amplify BTC upside moves more than negative catalysts (lawsuits) amplify downside moves, with a 1.5:1 asymmetric beta response within 4 hours of COIN price moves >3%.
hypothesis_content.rationale: COIN has become a regulated proxy for crypto exposure. Positive news validates ecosystem growth, while negative news is often viewed as COIN-specific. Retail flows amplify the positive correlation asymmetry during low-volatility regimes.
entry_conditions: COIN stock moves >3% in either direction during US market hours
BTC is trading within +/- 1% of pre-move price
No concurrent major BTC-specific news within 2 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC captures 80% of expected asymmetric move (calculate: if COIN +4%, expect BTC +1.2% = take profit at +0.96%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC moves opposite direction of COIN by >0.5%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC shows symmetric or inverse response to COIN moves, or response time exceeds 4 hours consistently.
